frontmatter.title: SwiftUI Crash in AG::LayoutDescriptor::compare
frontmatter.mdxPreview: I've been working lately on rewriting some of [CIFilter.io](/blog/cifilterio) in SwiftUI. One crash I came across that initially stumped me would happen when resetting my `UIHostingController`'s `rootView` to a view that was equivalent to the one already set...

frontmatter.title: SwiftUI: Two equal width columns
frontmatter.mdxPreview: A problem that many people run into after writing enough SwiftUI is how to make it so that two views inside an `HStack` have equal width, such that if the `HStack` grows both inner views expand proportionally...

frontmatter.title: Writing a UserDefaults editor with SwiftUI and property wrappers
frontmatter.mdxPreview: I've been talking a lot online about how useful SwiftUI has been in building debug components for [Fluency](https://getfluency.io?utm_source=noahgilmore.com&utm_campaign=userdefaultseditor&utm_content=0) - debug menus are one of the places where you can start using SwiftUI right now..

frontmatter.title: Relative date time formatting in SwiftUI
frontmatter.mdxPreview: In the wild world of 2019 SwiftUI development, lots of things aren't documented. One such thing I ran into recently was the usage of `RelativeDateTimeFormatter` in a `Text` view...
